name: Play as New England
description:
You can play as the updated §nNew England§! by starting the game as Canada, and releasing New England during the Second American Civil War.

You can also play by starting the game as the United States, and switching to New England if it forms. This can be guaranteed by choosing
£KR_game_rule_flag_NEE  £KR_game_rule_flag_CAN  §YForm New England§! in the game rules.
